dimensions: plate (sheet trimmed to plate): 30.8 × 19.1 cm (12 1/8 × 7 1/2 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Junius S. Morgan, Class of 1888
markings:
In graphite, verso lower left: Coll. Six, Leipzig 1929, 18 Rks (?)

In brown ink, verso upper right: 587 or S87, peaked mark, nu?
inscribed:
Four lines in Greek inscribed in plaque, upper center: ANNH ... KOP.

In margin verse: H. Goltzio eri inschulptum

Three lines in Latin with signature and date in lower margin, lower center: Istud suis coloribus depictum est per Raphaelem D'Vrbin / Romae in aede S.Augustini, per Gasparem Celij ibidem / adnotatum, et ab H. Goltzio eri inschulptum.  Anno 1592.
